posts.post_content:
T215 Type 1 Red Cross Hughie Jennings, SGC 40 - $999

[URL="http://t206themonster.com/Cards/FORSALE/ST215-Jennings.jpeg"][IMG]http://t206themonster.com/publishImages/Page-TMisc~~element405.png[/IMG][/URL]

Nice tough Type 1 with great color and registration, and parts of his name at top and bottom. Please send all inquiries to [url]ScottForrest@BelltownVintage.com[/url] 

Looking forward to scanning and offering additional inventory this weekend, after a long break from selling.

Prices are by check or money order (add 3% for Paypal), shipped and insured.

Also have the following available:

  * 1915 Cracker Jack - Walter Johnson - $695
  * N162 Brouthers SGC Auth (trimmed left) - $480
  * 1933 Goudey Babe Ruth #53 (Yellow portrait), mark on back - $1,220
  * 1933 Goudey Gehrig #92, mark on back - $870
  * 1933 Goudey Gehrig #160, mark on back - $650


Left-click image to see hi-res scan of front and back:

[URL="http://t206themonster.com/Cards/FORSALE/S15CJ-Johnson.jpeg"][IMG]http://t206themonster.com/Cards/Icons/iCJJohnson.png[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="http://t206themonster.com/Cards/FORSALE/SN162-BrouthSAuth.jpeg"][IMG]http://t206themonster.com/Cards/Icons/iN162-BrouthSAuth.png[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="http://runscott.homestead.com/Cards/FORSALE/33Goudey/S33G-053RuthMK.jpeg"][IMG]http://runscott.homestead.com/Cards/Icons/i33Goudey-53Ruth.png[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="http://runscott.homestead.com/Cards/FORSALE/33Goudey/S33G-092GehrigMK.jpeg"][IMG]http://runscott.homestead.com/Cards/Icons/i33Goudey-92Gehrig.png[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="http://runscott.homestead.com/Cards/FORSALE/33Goudey/S33G-160GehrigMK.jpeg"][IMG]http://runscott.homestead.com/Cards/Icons/i33Goudey-160Gehrig.png[/IMG][/URL]
Feel free to make offers on any except the Gehrigs.
